0.name: Marmot LimeLight 2P Tent
0.description: Limelight 2P tent maximizes livable space with its zone construction. Enjoy light, roomy comfort and 3-season protection on your next night in nature.

1.name: Osprey Atmos 65 AG Pack
1.description: Starting with a dreamlike Osprey suspension, this multiday pack carries gear easily in 11 external pockets, enhancing mobility and comfort while toting heavier loads through the backcountry.

2.name: Black Diamond FreeWire Quickdraw Quickpack - 18cm
2.description: With 6 light and versatile FreeWire draws, the 18cm Black Diamond FreeWire Quickpack is ideal for the sport climber on a budget.
